parts.name: Drums
parts.notes: 144 BPM punk tempo. Emphasize post-chorus repetition.

parts.name: Rhythm Guitar
parts.notes: Palm mutes and wide choruses. Drop D drive.

parts.name: Lead Guitar
parts.notes: Accent pre-chorus with leads and octave lines.

parts.name: Vocals
parts.notes: Chorus gang vocals. Snarled lead delivery.
